name: The Spirit of Outa
description:
After a near burn-out project at work, you go camping in a forest to sleep better, but you find yourself in a magic forest instead...

The Spirit of Outa is a micro visual novel made for O2A2 2022 Jam. 

  • <1000 words
  • one ending (but several ways to get there!)
  • AI-generated art by Editor (https://www.instagram.com/editorism.art/)
  • pretty seasons for everyone 🌱🌞🍂❄️
  • invigorating ❤️
  • awesome voice acting by Muossi
Credits:

Story - Ebbasuke & Editor
Art - Ebbasuke & Editor
Scripting - Ebbasuke
Sound Design - Ebbasuke & Editor
Voice - Muossi a.k.a "Morris" the cat
